1484100.name: Matt's Project Endless
1484100.description:
The year is 2077 and mankind is in peril. The world has been overrun by a plague of zombies, leaving only a few survivors scattered across the galaxy. In order to survive, these brave souls must rely on their wits and the power of science.

The survivors have taken to the stars, building a network of escape pods to travel between planets. Each pod is equipped with a variety of weapons and tools to help them fight off the zombie hordes. They must also scavenge for resources such as food, water, and fuel to keep their pods running.

The game mechanic uses the escape pods to travel between locations. Players must use their skills to scavenge for resources, build weapons, and repair their pods. They must also battle against the zombie hordes and other survivors in order to survive.

The atmosphere of the game is one of desperation and survival. The player must make tough choices in order to survive in this harsh environment. The game encourages players to think strategically and use the resources they find to their advantage.

The game is set in a futuristic space setting, with a zombie survival twist. Players must use their wits and the resources they find to make it through the game alive. With a combination of scavenging, crafting, and combat, players must use their skills to survive in this hostile environment.

What About Sound?

Don't worry, We come from a background of Mastering Audio Production since 2000. Find us at Ravesta Records and our Credits to our Artists in the game for Their music and other work in the game. OnDaMiKe, DJ Fixx, Face & Book, DJ Magic Mike, Pingüino, DJ EKL. Atmospheres, SFX, Weapons & More produced at top Quality for the immerse rive enviroments you been looking for :) some amazing work from our artists goes to the Night Club map, all our music Ravesta Records family is in house produced for the game! Check out the Music in our game Enjoy!

Become The Best Player

Learn all the weapon patterns, zombies, ai, your control with all the weapons, traps, knowing all pickups and of course Surviving tons of waves to be #1 On Leaderboards.

Features

  • Full Online Multiplayer With Steam! Play solo or With a buddy through system in-game!
  • Chat Online With Other Players!
  • Challenging Difficulties, waves get harder and harder to beat.
  • 1-6 Players per game!
  • Really smooth working settings, Audio selections for every type, and every graphic setting for optimal performance.
  • Recoil System & Bullet Drop created for each weapon in the game (increases/decreases in size based on spread of weapon while moving, aiming, etc)
  • Random Weapon Box
  • Traps
  • Power-Up Drops
  • Open-World seamlessly loads the environment with many areas to explore.
  • All zombies and ai will gradually become harder and increasingly faster as you progress in the game so it never gets dull.
  • Great Sound Selection! Music Produced by in house exclusive professionals. Copyright Royalty Free by Ravesta Records
  • & Much More!
